titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/12/2003--Introduced. Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan, adding authority for a transportation project in the Petoskey area.
